t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Hello again, Sanae. Did you think the spell could be turned off?

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: At least you got to know me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm saying no because nothing was done to my hair, as well as the gods of the Moriya Shrine.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My mother says you look better with that hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You are also correct; there is no official way to turn off the spell!

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Now that I'm seeing you again, I also want to meet with your mother once more!

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Once more? You won't wait to see her...
